explains: n. 薄荷；薄荷油；胡椒薄荷；薄荷糖（等于 mint）

sentences.en: I sank my teeth into a peppermint cream.
sentences.cn: 我的牙齿咬住了一块薄荷奶油糖。

sentences.en: There are chocolate and peppermint and also spinach, liver, and tripe.
sentences.cn: 有巧克力和薄荷，也有菠菜、肝脏和牛肚。

sentences.en: In this chocolate melting recipe, I use a little pure vanilla extract to enhance the icing. However, you could also use peppermint or coffee.
sentences.cn: 在巧克力融化配方里，我使用小纯香草精来增强糖衣的糖度，但是，您也可以使用薄荷或咖啡。
